# obliqueness

**Type Property**

The obliqueness of the text.

## Declaration

```swift
static let obliqueness: NSAttributedString.Key
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a floating point value indicating skew to be applied to glyphs. The default value is `0`, indicating no skew.

## Deprecated Keys

- **expansion**: The expansion factor of the text.
- **verticalGlyphForm**: The vertical glyph form of the text.
- **characterShapeAttributeName**: The character shape attribute.
- **usesScreenFontsDocumentAttribute**: The screen fonts attribute.
